titles.title: Heterogeneous Linguistics: Introduction to Heterogeneous Linguistics
ヘテロゲニア リンギスティコ ～異種族言語学入門～

title: Heterogenia Linguistic: Ishuzoku Gengogaku Nyuumon
title_japanese: ヘテロゲニア リンギスティコ ～異種族言語学入門～
title_synonyms: Heterogeneous Linguistics: Introduction to Heterogeneous Linguistics
synopsis:
Hakaba is an aspiring field linguist who specializes in the communication systems of monsters. After his professor injures himself in a hot-air balloon accident, Hakaba suddenly finds himself putting his knowledge to good use as he ventures into the Netherworld to pursue his professor's research. Upon arrival in his first village, Hakaba meets Susuki—his professor's half-werewolf half-human daughter. After adjusting to the environment's conditions, the two begin their journey to their first destination: the Cave of Goblins.

Heterogenia Linguistic: Ishuzoku Gengogaku Nyuumon follows the journey of Hakaba and Susuki as they traverse the Netherworld, documenting the languages and customs of every creature they come across.

[Written by MAL Rewrite]
background: Heterogenia Linguistic: Ishuzoku Gengogaku Nyuumon ranked 17th in the 2020 Kono Manga ga Sugoi! for the Male Readers division. It was also nominated for the Tsugi ni Kuru Manga 2020 Awards under the Web Manga category. The series has been published in English as Heterogenia Linguistico by Yen Press since October 27, 2020.
